# smisc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package smisc contains utility functions without focus on a specific topic.

## Installation

There is no CRAN version available yet. 

Once a CRAN version will be availabe you should be able to install the released version of smisc from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("smisc")
```

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) can be installed with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sebastian-gerdes/smisc")
```
## Example

```{r example}
library(smisc)
## basic example code
square(9)
```
